name: Ancestral Mind
summary: By unraveling memories and connections passed down from your progenitors and buried within your unconscious mind, you learn to convert your inherent magic into psychic power.

name: Counter Thought
summary: When a foe Casts a Spell that has the mental trait and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own mental magic to disrupt it.

name: Mental Buffer
summary: Your mind deflects some amount of harm from attacks that induce pain or manipulate your mind directly.

name: Psychic Rapport
summary: Your telepathic sensitivity intensifies when you're affected by mental magic, making it easier for you to link to other creatures.

name: Cantrip Expansion
trait: Bard, Cleric, Magus, Oracle, Psychic, Sorcerer, Witch, Wizard
summary: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Mental Balm
summary: Your spells release soothing mental waves.

name: Psi Burst
trait: Concentrate, Evocation, Mindshift, Occult, Psyche, Psychic
summary: With a passing thought, you direct violent psychic energies at a nearby creature.

name: Warp Space
summary: You use your magic to bend space, causing your spell to strike from a strange vector.

name: Astral Tether
summary: You spin out a thread of psychic energy that connects you to an ally, using it as a conduit for your abilities.

name: Homing Beacon
summary: As your spell strikes a target, you plant a beacon in the target's mind that announces its presence to those nearby.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 185</row>
trait: Bard, Champion, Cleric, Druid, Magus, Monk, Oracle, Psychic, Ranger, Sorcerer, Summoner, Uncommon, Witch, Wizard
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Psi Strikes
summary: You siphon residual psychic energies from your spell into one weapon you're wielding or one of your unarmed attacks and when you unleash your mind, the energies flare to match.

name: Thoughtform Summoning
summary: You can create a prototypical creature from the depths of your imagination instead of calling one from elsewhere.

name: Violent Unleash
summary: The force of your mind unleashing itself wracks your enemies with a violent shockwave.

name: Inertial Barrier
summary: Your spell leaves behind barriers that reduce shock and motion.

name: Parallel Breakthrough
summary: You expand your mind beyond your area of psychic specialty.

name: Sixth Sense
summary: Your psychic abilities also allow you to detect the lingering thoughts of spirits and similar entities.

name: Steady Spellcasting
trait: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Oracle, Psychic, Sorcerer, Witch, Wizard
summary: You don’t lose spells easily. If a reaction would disrupt your spellcasting action, attempt a DC 15 flat check. If you succeed, your action isn’t disrupted.

name: Strain Mind
summary: You strain your body beyond its limits to use an amp even when your mental power is depleted.

name: Brain Drain
summary: With a wresting of will, you siphon off a creature's mental energy to replenish your own.

name: Dark Persona's Presence
trait: Aura, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Mental, Psychic
summary:
When you Unleash your Psyche, all your rage and pain—the portion of your psyche dedicated to cruel retribution—come along with it.

 The force of your dark persona's negativity batters constantly against all creatures in a 30-foot emanation when you Unleash your Psyche and for as long as your Psyche is Unleashed.

name: Mental Static
summary: Your thoughts sting back when a lesser mind tries to invade your own.

name: Remove Presence
summary: Your spell reaches into the mind of a creature and removes you from it.

name: Thoughtsense
summary: You can detect the flickers of mental activity let off by all thinking creatures.

name: Whispering Steps
summary: Your spell leaves a lingering connection between you and a creature—one through which you can nudge the creature's mind this way or that.

name: Dream Guise
summary: You Stride into a willing ally's space, at which point both of your appearances shift into a shared third appearance, usually one that looks like a mix of the two of you.

name: Emotional Surge
summary: Your heart soars, increasing your power for a moment.

name: Impose Order (Psychic)
summary: You bring discipline to your mind and magic, ensuring that you don't under-perform.

name: Scour the Library
summary: Seeing an enemy's attack, you quickly consult multiple scraps of lore in your mind, synthesizing them into the perfect plan.

name: Signature Spell Expansion
summary: Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom.

name: Foreseen Failure
summary: You see your spell fail to take hold to disastrous end, then snap back to reality—it was all a precognition, and you know to try a different spell.

name: No!!!
summary: The shock of seeing your ally near death breaks whatever limits exist in your mind, sending your power spilling forth.

name: Psi Catastrophe
trait: Concentrate, Evocation, Mindshift, Occult, Psyche, Psychic
summary: You stop holding your power back, unleashing it all in a catastrophic blast.

name: Conscious Spell Specialization
summary: You become more adept with the spells that are always in your mind.

name: Deep Roots
summary: Your mind-control spells send burrowing mental roots that tear at your target's mind when they're removed or run their course.

name: Shatter Space
summary: The sheer power of your magic fractures reality.

name: Constant Levitation
summary: Your power has unbound you from the earth below.

name: Target of Psychic Ire
summary: Your magic saturates your surroundings with hateful psychic energy.

name: Wandering Thoughts
summary: When your Psyche is Unleashed, each burst of magic you cast also folds space around you, and you travel through one of those folds.

name: All in your Head
summary: Flames scouring at your body, venom coursing through your veins—you refuse to believe they exist, and nothing can affect you if you don't believe in it.

name: Cranial Detonation
summary: As your overwhelming psyche fells a creature, you use its flickering consciousness to detonate psychic energy from the creature's head.

name: Deepest Wellspring
summary: You've glimpsed the furthest recesses of your mind.

name: Become Thought
summary: You shed some of your material form, becoming a being of pure thought.

name: Mind over Matter
summary: Your mind's limits are only what you imagine them to be.

name: Twin Psyche
summary: You've segmented your psyche so it can operate in tandem.

name: Unlimited Potential
summary: The laws of magic can limit your mind only if you think you need them, and you've grown past the need for such limits.
